transcript.text: shabbat shalom everybody shabbat shalom
it's Saturday July 27 it's 24th day of
the 4th Hebrew month it is the Sabbath
day I've gone on a nice long hike here
the Lena Cove hike and ends up on this
beautiful bluff here I've actually seen
a few of the seals and some salmon
there's a seagull but in any case I just
wanted to make this short video because
I've been getting a lot of emails people
contacting me saying that they've been
struggling with depression and I just
want to give a tip on I think the best
way to overcome depression and a lot of
times what happens is depression is the
result of being focused on yourself but
when you're focused on loving God and
loving others then depression just it
doesn't have any room in your life it
just it goes away and so I just want to
encourage people that if you're
struggling with that ask God say okay
give me a mission you know we're all
different members of the body of Messiah
we all have different personalities
different giftings different skills and
so God always has different ways that we
can help others to show the love of God
to others to serve others and when you
do that then you don't have time to be
feeling sorry for yourself or being
depressed or or whatnot like for me
personally yeah I have my regular job
where I expose child sex trafficking but
also I do this prayer meeting when I
have a prayer meeting every single night
and we're praying for subscribers we
have a list now of over 800 different
requests we go through about 15 every
night and we pray for these people and
that's sort of my way of being able to
serve others help people to serve my
subscribers so ask God how you can do
that it may be helping your neighbor
there may be a widow somewhere that
needs to be taken care of and and helped
out there may be a local volunteer
organization that you can go be a part
of who knows maybe there's a lot of
different ways to to minister and to
help and serve others and I guarantee
when you start doing that you're not
going to be dealing with depression
remember the fruits of the spirit there
love joy peace patience and
long-suffering goodness kindness
gentleness faith meekness self-control
and temperance we should be asking yah
to help these fruits ripen in our lives
more and more and more each and every
day so we can be a greater blessing to
him and to those around us it is just a
gorgeous gorgeous day today raindrops
are actually falling right now on my
head about 65 degrees the water is
gorgeous and I was hoping I would see a
seal cut these seals are massive I've
seen at least a couple just on my short
little time out here but as you can see
it is just it's just a beautiful
beautiful summer day yeah alright just
wanted to make this short little Sabbath
hike video and try to encourage people
out there that might be struggling and
dealing with depression keep your focus
on him and ask him practical ways of how
you can help those around you god bless
you guys shabbat shalom
